alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Cape Girardeau; Stoddard; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bollinger, southeastern Wayne, western Cape Girardeau and northwestern Stoddard Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alliance to Leopold to near Lake Wappapello State Park. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Marble Hill, Leopold, Alliance and Patton around 305 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bollinger Mill State Historic Site, Daisy, Millersville, Burfordville and Puxico. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 111 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
